name: SONAROGUE
description:
• WASD: Move and Fight
  • E: Interact
  • F: Open Bag

This game is made in a two-week game challenge. It's a sonar-detect roguelike game. In this dungeon, your vision is taken, and your only ability is to use a sonar device. 

Dive into the dungeon! Carefully use your Sonar Bait and Sonar Boom to fight enemies! Good luck, my friend. 

Select your upgrades and build your character! Be a tough fighter or... a powerful sonarogue? It's your choice! 

Leave any comments below. Cheers!
